Class Workbooks

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public static boolean dispose(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook)
        Dispose of temporary files backing an SXSSFWorkbook on disk. Calling this method will render the workbook unusable.

        This method is a no-op for other Workbook implementations.

        Parameters:
        workbook - the specified workbook
        Returns:
        true if the specified workbook is an SXSSFWorkbook and all temporary files were successfully deleted

      • getOrCreateActiveSheet

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet getOrCreateActiveSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook)
        Convenience method to get the active sheet from the specified workbook.

        The active sheet is the sheet which is displayed when a Microsoft Excel workbook is opened.

        If the workbook does not contain any sheets then Sheet1 will be created.

        Parameters:
        workbook - the specified workbook
        Returns:
        the active sheet from the specified workbook

      • getOrCreateFirstSheet

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet getOrCreateFirstSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook)
        Convenience method to get the first sheet from the specified workbook.

        If the workbook does not contain any sheets then Sheet1 will be created.

        Parameters:
        workbook - the specified workbook
        Returns:
        the first sheet in the specified workbook

      • getOrCreateSheet

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet getOrCreateSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                                                                 int index)
        Returns the specified sheet from the workbook. If the number of sheets in this workbook is less than the given index then new sheets will be created until the specified index is reached.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the workbook
        index - the 0-based index of the sheet to return
        Returns:
        the specified sheet from the workbook

      • getOrCreateSheet

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet getOrCreateSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                                                                 String name)
        Returns the specified sheet from the workbook. If the sheet does not exist it will be created.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the workbook
        name - the name of the sheet
        Returns:
        the specified sheet from the workbook

      • getSheet

        public static Optional<org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet> getSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                                                                   int index)
        Returns the specified sheet from the workbook or an empty Optional if the number of sheets in the workbook is less than index.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the specified workbook
        index - the 0-based index of the sheet to return
        Returns:
        the specified sheet from the workbook or an empty Optional if the number of sheets in the workbook is less than index
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if index < 0

      • getSheet

        public static Optional<org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet> getSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                                                                   String name)
        Returns the specified sheet from the workbook or an empty Optional if the sheet does not exist.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the workbook
        name - the name of the sheet
        Returns:
        the specified sheet from the workbook or an empty Optional if the sheet does not exist

      • newWorkbook

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook newWorkbook(Workbooks.Format format)
        Creates a new Workbook with an empty sheet.

        Workbooks can be created in the classic Excel Binary File Format xls format or the Office Open XML xlsx format.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information. Consider creating an SXSSFWorkbook manually if explicit control over its behavior is desired.

        Parameters:
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        Returns:
        a new Workbook with an empty sheet

      • newWorkbook

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook newWorkbook(Workbooks.Format format,
                                                               int nsheets)
        Creates a new Workbook and adds the specified number of empty sheets.

        Workbooks can be created in the classic Excel Binary File Format xls format or the Office Open XML xlsx format.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information. Consider creating an SXSSFWorkbook manually if explicit control over its behavior is desired.

        Parameters:
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        nsheets - the number of sheets to create in the workbook
        Returns:
        a new Workbook containing the specified number of empty sheets named Sheet1, Sheet2, Sheet3, etc...

      • open

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook open(InputStream in,
                                                        Workbooks.Format format)
                                                 throws IOException
        Opens a workbook from the specified input stream. Does not close the stream.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information. Consider creating an SXSSFWorkbook manually if explicit control over its behavior is desired.

        Parameters:
        in - the specified input stream
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        Returns:
        a new workbook created from the specified input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • open

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook open(Path path)
                                                 throws IOException
        Opens a workbook from the specified path. It is generally recommended that the user explicitly specify the format by calling open(Path, Format) method.

        This convenience method will guess the Workbooks.Format based on the file extension.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to load
        Returns:
        a new workbook object from the specified path
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • open

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook open(Path path,
                                                        Workbooks.Format format)
                                                 throws IOException
        Opens a workbook from the specified path.

        Streaming Office Open XML workbooks will be created using the default settings. See SXSSFWorkbook and new SXSSFWorkbook(XSSFWorkbook) for more information. Consider creating an SXSSFWorkbook manually if explicit control over its behavior is desired.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to load
        format - specifies which workbook format to use
        Returns:
        a new workbook from the specified file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • removeSheet

        public static org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook removeSheet(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet sheet)
        Removes a sheet from this workbook.
        Parameters:
        sheet - the sheet to remove
        Returns:
        the workbook where the sheet was located

      • save

        public static Path save(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                        Path path)
                 throws IOException
        Writes the given workbook to the specified path. Does not close the workbook.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the given workbook
        path - the specified path
        Returns:
        the specified file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • save

        public static Path save(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                        Path path,
                        boolean close)
                 throws IOException
        Writes the given workbook to the specified path.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the given workbook
        path - the specified path
        close - whether or not to close and dispose the workbook
        Returns:
        the specified file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • write

        public static <T extends OutputStream> T write(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook,
                                               T out,
                                               boolean close)
                                        throws IOException
        Writes the given workbook to the specified output stream. Does not close the stream.
        Parameters:
        workbook - the given workbook
        out - the specified output stream
        close - whether or not to close and dispose the workbook
        Returns:
        the specified output stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getFileExtension

        public static String getFileExtension(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook)
        Returns the file extension xls or xlsx corresponding the specified workbook. The returned extension does not include the leading dot character.

        Only HSSFWorkbook, XSSFWorkbook, or SXSSFworkbook types are supported.

        Parameters:
        workbook - the specified workbook
        Returns:
        the file extension xls or xlsx corresponding the specified workbook
